posts.post_content: Cy Young Portrait~Piedmont 150. Creasing throughout and marks on the back but still displays decent for the grade. Asking $1,300 PayPal F&F or add 3% for goods & services ($1,340). Open to reasonable offers. PM if you’re interested or would like more photos.
Bump for $100 price reduction to $1200 PayPal F&F. Bought this a few years back on here from PolarBear Pete and looking to get back out what I have in it. Motivated to sell, let me know. Thanks again

Figured one last price reduction & bump before sending it to auction on eBay
$1,000 F&F. Thanks!:D
